languages.text: {n}Теперь вы знаете, что даже среди мутантов есть те, что выглядят симпатично, а есть откровенные уроды. Ваш собеседник — из последних.{/n}
{n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Теперь вы знаете, что даже среди мутантов есть те, что выглядят симпатично, а есть откровенные уроды. Ваш собеседник — из последних.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant-looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}
{n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant-looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}

{n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}
{n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sabes bien que algunos mutantes pueden tener un aspecto agradable, mientras que otros son espeluznantes. El hombre con el que hablas pertenece al segundo grupo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sabes bien que algunos mutantes pueden tener un aspecto agradable, mientras que otros son espeluznantes. El hombre con el que hablas pertenece al segundo grupo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}现在你意识到，尽管变种人可能也会长得很讨人喜欢，但还有一部分则是彻头彻尾的畸形。现在正与你说话的，便是后面这种。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}现在你意识到，尽管变种人可能也会长得很讨人喜欢，但还有一部分则是彻头彻尾的畸形。现在正与你说话的，便是后面这种。{/n}

languages.text: {n}なるほど、変異体と言えど、見た目が親しみやすいものもいれば、まったく悍ましいものもいるのか。こちらに話しかける男は後者に当てはまる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}なるほど、変異体と言えど、見た目が親しみやすいものもいれば、まったく悍ましいものもいるのか。こちらに話しかける男は後者に当てはまる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du weißt, dass sogar Mutanten gut aussehen können, wohingegen andere nachgerade monströs wirken. Der Mann vor dir gehört zur zweiten Kategorie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du weißt, dass sogar Mutanten gut aussehen können, wohingegen andere nachgerade monströs wirken. Der Mann vor dir gehört zur zweiten Kategorie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous savez maintenant qu'il existe des mutants à l'apparence plaisante, tandis que d'autres sont tout bonnement épouvantables. L'homme qui vous parle appartient à la deuxième catégorie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous savez maintenant qu'il existe des mutants à l'apparence plaisante, tandis que d'autres sont tout bonnement épouvantables. L'homme qui vous parle appartient à la deuxième catégorie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bazı mutantların göze hitap ettiğini biliyorsun ancak kalanların görüntüsü, insanın midesini kaldırıyor. Seninle konuşan adam da ne yazık ki ikinci gruba giriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Now you know that even mutants can be pleasant looking, while others are downright freakish in appearance. The man talking to you is of the latter kind.{/n}
